docs.text: Welcome to Apogee Playground Apogee is a first-of-its-kind application with a unique service offering that isn't found anywhere else. It encourages everyone everywhere to find their unique selves and express themselves without holding back. Best of all, they get paid for simply being themselves. Apogee encourages a free, playful, stress-free lifestyle. Welcome to the world's first playground! Get Started :fontawesome-arrow-right:
docs.title: Welcome to Apogee Playground

docs.text: Installation Android Open this link , or search for "Apogee Playground" on Google Play Store Tap Install button IOS Apogee Playground is available only on Android at the moment. IOS version is coming soon.

docs.text: Signing Up Open Apogee Playground app Tap on the Sign Up button Enter your name, display name, email, password, PIN. Please See Password Requirements and PIN Requirements for more information. Password Requirements PIN Requirements
